descriptionHtml:
Sorry.I can not use English very much.
This text is made from Excite translation.
This MOD adds three elf's follower.

This follower mod is standalone.
They are three sisters.

The eldest daughter is Elsa, the second daughter is Sala, and the third daughter is Lal.

You can find them at sleeping giant in riverwood.

Their body type is UNPB.

~~~The postscript in May 28~~~
I added a new file.
Elf_sisters in Honeybrew Meadery near Whiterun adds three sisters at Honeybrew Meadery near Whiterun.
Please to introduce Elf_sisters or Elf_sisters in Honeybrew Meadery near Whiterun.

[size=25]===Elsa===[/size]
[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/54377-1-1401108187.jpg[/img]
Combat style:Archery

Skill:Almost all archery skill,almost all light armor skill and light Foot

Magic:Healing


[size=25]===Sala===[/size]
[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/54377-3-1401108188.jpg[/img]
Combat style:One hand sword and a 2 sword style

Skill:Almost all the one hand sword skill,almost all light armor skill and light Foot

Magic:Healing


[size=25]===Lal===[/size]
[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/54377-2-1401108188.jpg[/img]
Combat style:Both-hands arms

Skill:Almost all both-hands arms skill and Almost all heavy armor skill

Magic:Healing


[youtube]jwycSQtfnaA[/youtube]
made by Storm Forge Gaming. Thanks!
